copy.starthost: Click 'join' to join the game, and 'start' to start it
copy.personOut: Oh no! #PLAYER# is out! Better luck next time!
copy.youOut: Whoops! You got out! I'm sure you'll do better next time!
copy.watch: You're out for this round, but let's watch everyone else play!
copy.claimed: You got it! Now wait for everyone else!
